string.value: #p2101010# should be done with the Tigun Transformation Potion. Go see #b#p2101010##k.

You got the transformation potion that allows you to change into #p2101004#. The potion doesn't look appetizing... Oh well. You should take the #p2101004# transformation potion, head to #b#m260010600##k, and steal some #bsilk#k from #b#p2101013##k.\n\n#i4031571# #t4031571# #b#c4031571#/1#k
You received the queen's order of silk from #p2101004# and gave it to #p2101010#. Awesome! Your first mission as a Sand Bandit...complete!

Ah, you're back. The Tigun Transformation Potion is now complete. Drink the potion and go to #b#p2101013##k to receive an order of silk. The merchant that deals with the queen should be around #b#m260010600##k.

Once you have transformed into #p2101004#, you can't attack anyone. If you accidentally use a skill when using the disguise, everything will be ruined. Also, if you're attacked, the transformation will end. To summarize, do not engage in a fight on your way to #p2101013#.
You will be transformed for #b1 hour#k. During that time, you should #bnever attack or be attacked#k. In that time, you must also get an order of silk from #p2101013# and safely come back. Good luck.
Did the potion scare you off? Hmmm, then who should I ask to do this? #p2101003#, since he looks a lot like Tigun?
Ohhhh, you're back. Did you get the order of silk from #p2101013#?
Brilliant. Instead of fighting our fellow residents to steal the queen's treasures, it's much better to steal like this, nice and quiet, with no one realizing exactly what happened.
Hmmm... Haven't obtained the #b#t4031571##k yet? With the money we'll earn from that, the residents of #m260000000# won't go hungry for a while.

Hmmm? You lost the #p2101013#-transformation potion? You didn't throw that away because it looked gross, did you? Don't worry. I made lots of potions using #p2101013#'s beard, so I'll give you another one.
